Interface IUserInterface

    public interface IUserInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void getCorpusFileName()
      * Displays the translation options to the user and, after reading in the option selected by the user, sets * the name of the corpus file.
      void getSourceText()
      * Requests the text the user wants to translate (i.e.
      void greeting()
      * Displays a greeting to the user and indicates briefly what the program does.
      void runProgram()
      * Calls the necessary methods to: display a greeting, ask the user what s/he wants to do; update the * corpus file name and the text to be translated based on the user's input, uses these to initialize * a Translator object, and loops until the user no longer wants to translate any sentences.
      void translate()
      * Uses the Translator object to translate the source text and displays the translated text to the user.

    • Method Detail

      • runProgram

        void runProgram()
         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        * Calls the necessary methods to: display a greeting, ask the user what s/he wants to do; update the * corpus file name and the text to be translated based on the user's input, uses these to initialize * a Translator object, and loops until the user no longer wants to translate any sentences.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Included in case input file is not found.

      • getCorpusFileName

        void getCorpusFileName()
        * Displays the translation options to the user and, after reading in the option selected by the user, sets * the name of the corpus file. Uses try-catch block(s) to enforce correct input.
